Name: BlockDoc
About the game: Block dock is a simple fighting type block breaking game. Block breaking Ã— Air hockey was developed as a concept. Let's tactically destroy enemy blocks using items Item There are currently three types of items. Green item: Player or enemy will be longer Blue Item: The reflection of the ball will be random Orange Item: Ball speed will increase Map There are currently 4 types of maps. Enjoy a strategic game from simple maps of four types. from now on We will add rich effects and content to make it more enjoyable. Moreover, it will evolve further according to your voice Have fun at cheap prices
